Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone,

Got turned onto this game because of my good friend Raven was raving about it, so I got it and man was he right. Great game and can see a great potential for this game. Right now, my friend and I are trying to build a Space Station together. I installed Mech Jeb and another mod that allows for a space shuttle with cargo bays. Does anyone have any suggestions on where I should start?
Start small (unless you are that awesome) just perfect the orbiting, then build small objects to go inside the bay. Good luck and best of wishes.

Hello

as Austin said, I would recommend to start perfecting orbiting and learning orbital mechanics, so that you'd know what you're doing while performing a rendezvous ) as you perfect that, you're just a step away from landing on the MÃƒÂ¼n, which is just a step away from traveling to other planets

Good luck with your space program and have a nice stay with this great community
